alert.note: Alert for Custer (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 31 at 3:12PM MDT until May 31 at 4:15PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: The National Weather Service in Rapid City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... North central Custer County in southwestern South Dakota... * Until 415 PM MDT. * At 312 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Stockade Lake, or near Custer, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. At 303 PM MDT, Half dollar sized hail was reported 1 mile east-northeast of Custer. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. * Locations impacted include... Custer, Center Lake, Stockade Lake, Custer State Park, Mount Coolidge, Legion Lake and Black Hills Playhouse. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: This storm is producing large hail. SEEK SHELTER NOW inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows! Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
